title: Valentine’s Day single-page React SPA (template recreation)

requirements.summary: Build the single-page SPA structure in React/TypeScript matching the provided template (hearts background, header, content cards/sections, quote, footer).
acceptanceCriteria: The page renders all sections present in the provided HTML (header, 6 content cards including the secret section, quote, footer).
The layout matches the original intent: centered content, max-width container, glassmorphism cards, and a pink gradient background.
No inline HTML/JS is used; the page is implemented as React components with JSX.

file_operations.description: Create the SPA root that renders the full Valentine’s Day page layout (floating hearts background layer, header, the ordered set of 6 content cards/sections including the secret section, quote block, and footer) using React (TSX) components; wire all subcomponents so nothing is orphaned.

Create the single page container component that composes header, cards/sections, quote, and footer into the exact sequence/structure from the provided template and keeps everything centered within a max-width layout.
Create a background-only component that renders the floating hearts layer behind the page content (non-interactive, pointer-events disabled) and can be placed at the top of the SPA layout.
Create the header component with title/subtitle and the clickable heart element (the click behavior is implemented under REQ-3); keep the structure aligned with the provided HTML intent.
Create a reusable glassmorphism card wrapper used by each of the 6 content sections to enforce consistent structure, spacing, and styling across sections.
Create a dedicated quote block component to match the template’s quote section layout and typography.
Create the footer component to match the template’s footer content and alignment.
Ensure the app renders the new SPA by importing/using the created App component (keep existing providers intact) so the Valentine page is what appears at launch.

requirements.summary: Recreate the original styling with Tailwind and minimal custom CSS for keyframe animations (gradient background, glass cards, hover scale, buttons, typography, animations).
acceptanceCriteria: The background uses the same (or visually equivalent) pink gradient and white text.
Cards have a translucent/blurred glass appearance and subtly scale on hover.
Heartbeat, floating-hearts, and burst animations are implemented and visually work as in the template.

file_operations.description: Add Tailwind base/components/utilities plus minimal custom CSS needed for keyframes and shared Valentine theme primitives (pink gradient background, glass card effect helpers, heartbeat/floatUp/burst animations) while keeping styling primarily Tailwind-driven.

Extend Tailwind theme tokens/utilities as needed to support the Valentine design direction (e.g., consistent radii/shadows/animation names used by components) while keeping the palette centered on the provided pink gradient.
Apply Tailwind classes for glassmorphism (translucency + blur), consistent padding/spacing, and hover scale behavior so all sections match the template’s card feel.
Apply Tailwind typography scale and the heartbeat animation styling for the header heart (keyframes provided via index.css) to match the template.
Apply Tailwind positioning (fixed/inset layering) and hook up the floating hearts animation classes defined in index.css so the background effect is visible and behind the content.

requirements.summary: Implement all template JavaScript behaviors using React state/effects (heart burst, popups, random reasons, relationship timer, NO button movement, YES confirmation + burst, secret password unlock).
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the header heart triggers a visible burst of multiple hearts that animate upward and disappear.
The Love Letter popup opens/closes and blocks interaction with the background while open.
Clicking “Show Reason” replaces the placeholder text with one of the provided reasons, randomly selected.
The relationship timer displays days/hours/minutes/seconds since 2022-08-01 and updates once per second.
Hovering over the “NO” button causes it to move within the proposal box area (not off-screen).
Clicking “YES” shows a celebratory confirmation message (not a browser alert) and triggers the heart burst effect.
Entering the correct password (case-insensitive) opens the Secret Message popup; incorrect password shows an inline error (not a browser alert).

file_operations.description: Create an overlay layer component responsible for rendering and animating a temporary burst of hearts on demand (spawn multiple hearts with randomized positions/offsets, animate upward, then remove).
Create a small hook to manage heart-burst state and expose a trigger function used by the header heart and the YES button.
Implement the Love Letter popup as a modal dialog using the shadcn-ui Dialog component to ensure proper overlay/blocking behavior; Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Implement the Secret Message popup as a modal dialog using the shadcn-ui Dialog component; include support for opening only when password validation succeeds; Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create the ‘Reasons’ section/card with a ‘Show Reason’ button that selects a random reason from the provided list and replaces the placeholder text using React state.
Create a hook that computes elapsed time since 2022-08-01 and updates once per second, returning days/hours/minutes/seconds for display.
Create the timer section/card that displays the relationship duration using the timer hook and updates live once per second.

Create the proposal section/card with YES/NO buttons: NO repositions within the proposal container on hover; YES shows an in-card celebratory confirmation message and triggers the heart burst via the shared burst trigger.
Create the secret section/card with password input and unlock button: validate case-insensitive match for 'bubu', show inline error message on failure, and open the Secret Message dialog on success.
Wire header heart click to call the shared heart-burst trigger from the heart burst hook.

Compose and wire the interactive section components (Love letter open/close, reasons generator, relationship timer, proposal interactions, secret unlock + dialogs) and include the HeartBurstLayer so bursts render above content when triggered.
Add/adjust the keyframe animations and utility classes needed by the heart burst and floating hearts effects (heartbeat, floatUp, burst) so they animate and clean up visually as in the template.

requirements.summary: Translate all non-English (Hindi) user-facing template text into natural romantic English while preserving structure and meaning (including both popups).
acceptanceCriteria: All visible text on the page and in popups is in English.
The Love Letter popup remains a multi-paragraph romantic note addressed to “Bubu”.
The Secret Message popup remains a multi-paragraph romantic note and includes the Valentine’s Day closing sentiment.

file_operations.description: Replace the provided Hindi Love Letter text with a natural multi-paragraph English love note addressed to “Bubu”, preserving the original romantic intent and structure.
Replace the provided Hindi secret message with a natural multi-paragraph English message, preserving the original reveal/closing sentiment for Valentine’s Day.
Ensure all remaining headings, labels, button texts, helper text, and section copy used across the page are in English and consistent with the template’s meaning.

requirements.summary: Apply a consistent Valentine’s Day theme system (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) using the provided pink palette across the whole page.
acceptanceCriteria: A single coherent style system is evident (consistent button styles, card styles, spacing, and typography across the whole page).
The theme remains Valentine’s Day/romantic and does not introduce unrelated color schemes (e.g., no dominant blue/purple palette).

file_operations.description: Create a small shared button component to enforce consistent Tailwind styling for primary/secondary actions across sections (hover/active states consistent). Optionally wrap/compose shadcn-ui Button for consistency; Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Define the core Valentine theme look (page background gradient, default text color, consistent typography defaults) and any shared utility classes that keep spacing and styling coherent across all sections.
Centralize the consistent card styling tokens (spacing, radius, glass effect, border/shadow) so every section uses the same visual system.
Ensure each section uses the shared ValentineCard and ValentineButton patterns to keep consistent spacing/typography and maintain the pink romantic palette across the entire single-page layout.
